recipesJson.name: RY4 Classic Cracker
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description: A classic RY4 recipe with Graham Cracker, Honey, and Vanilla notes. Simple. Luxurious.

reviews.text:
An another banger, really simple but so much enjoyment. 
At 7 days steep was ok but at 1 month it shines. The cracker, the honey note it is just on point. Can defenitly be a ADV for me.
